trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: Representa a coleção de esquemas XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be added to the collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>o objeto a adicionar à coleção de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>é adicionado.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Adds an instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> classe para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> object to be added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar ao fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto que representa uma referência de assemblagem para a coleção.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>A adicionar.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the schema object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>do objeto de esquema.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>é adicionado.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto que representa uma referência de assemblagem para a coleção.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>A adicionar.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: Processa os nomes de elemento e atributo nos esquemas XML e, opcionalmente, valida os esquemas XML.

trans-unit.source: The following list identifies situations in which the Compile method is called: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.
trans-unit.target: A lista seguinte identifica as situações em que é chamado o método de compilação: - pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>classe ao criar <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>objetos a partir de classes que são identificados como serviços Web.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>

trans-unit.source: - By the Wsdl.exe tool or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: -Pela ferramenta Wsdl.exe ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>classe, ao gerar classes de proxy do cliente ou servidor abstrato classes de um documento do Web Services Description Language (WSDL).</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>

trans-unit.source: - By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -Pela ferramenta Xsd.exe ao gerar esquemas XML de tipos encontrados em assemblagens.

trans-unit.source: Instead of calling the Compile method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de chamar o método de compilação diretamente, utilize a classes mencionadas anteriormente ou as ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> that specifies the callback method that handles errors and warnings during XML Schema validation, if the strict parameter is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> que especifica o método de chamada de retorno que processa os erros e avisos durante a validação de esquema XML, se o parâmetro strict estiver definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the XML schemas in the collection using the Compile method of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para validar os esquemas XML na coleção utilizando o método de compilação do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> classe; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that belongs to the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a coleção contém um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto que pertence ao espaço de nomes especificado.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the item to check for.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes do item para procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item for localizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> contains a specific schema.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> contém um esquema específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto localizar.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the collection contains the specified item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se a coleção contém o item especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, which starts at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> para um ecrã compatível com unidimensional <xref:System.Array>, que começa no índice da matriz de destino especificado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the schemas copied from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino de esquemas copiados <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>tem de ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the array where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro 32 bits que representa o índice de matriz onde copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: Locates in one of the XML schemas an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> of the specified name and type.
trans-unit.target: Localiza dos esquemas XML um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> do nome especificado e do tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that specifies a fully qualified name with a namespace used to locate an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>que especifica um nome completamente qualificado com um espaço de nomes utilizado para localizar um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto na coleção.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objecto a localizar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Possible types include: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Possible types include: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of schemas that belong to the same namespace.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de esquemas que pertencem ao mesmo espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: O método devolve um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the schemas to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes de esquemas para a obter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> implementation that contains the schemas.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IList>implementação que contém os esquemas.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified schema and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa para o esquema especificado e devolve o índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência dentro de todo o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>Localizar.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência do valor em todo o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a schema into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um esquema para o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `schema` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero que `schema` devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>o objeto a inserir.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the schemas have been compiled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os esquemas foram compilados.

trans-unit.source: You can compile the schemas referenced in a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas> object by invoking the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode compilar os esquemas referenciados num <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas>objeto invocando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the schemas have been compiled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se os esquemas foram compilados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Static method that determines whether the specified XML schema contains a custom <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, or its equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Método estático que determina se o esquema XML especificado contém um personalizado <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""> </xref> atributo definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, ou equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The `IsDataSet` attribute comes from the namespace `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata`.
trans-unit.target: O `IsDataSet` atributo provém do espaço de nomes `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata`.

trans-unit.source: The IsDataSet method is called by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure and does not need to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: O método IsDataSet denomina-se pela infraestrutura de serialização de XML do .NET Framework e não precisa de ser chamado diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The XML schema to check for an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O esquema XML para procurar um <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""> </xref> atributo com um <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified schema exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o esquema especificado existe; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto no índice especificado.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a obter.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> especificado

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents the XML schema associated with the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma determinada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto que representa o esquema XML associado com espaço de nomes especificado.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes de objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa os processos personalizados adicionais quando limpar os conteúdos do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa os processos personalizados adicionais antes de a inserir um novo elemento para a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero no qual pretende inserir `value`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de elemento no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa os processos personalizados adicionais ao remover um elemento a partir do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero que `value` pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to remove at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O valor do elemento para remover em `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa os processos personalizados adicionais antes de definir um valor <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `oldValue` can be found.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero que `oldValue` pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The value to replace with `newValue`.
trans-unit.target: O valor substitui `newValue`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de elemento no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific schema from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência de um esquema específico a partir do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>para remover.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
